trans-unit.source: Displays a check box that allows the user to select a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> condition.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个复选框，允许用户选择<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>条件。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the CheckBox control to allow the user to select a `true` or `false` state.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#Introduction) - [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 介绍使用复选框控件允许用户选择`true`或`false`状态。

trans-unit.source: If you plan to use multiple CheckBox controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control is an alternative control that provides convenient data binding capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果你计划使用多个复选框控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件是其他控件，提供方便的数据绑定功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: However, individual CheckBox controls provide greater control over layout.
trans-unit.target: 但是，单独的复选框控件提供更好地控制布局。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > A CheckBox control accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> CheckBox 控件接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET mobile Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 移动网页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本利用概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control to be rendered to the specified output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTML 特性和样式添加<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件呈现到指定的输出流。

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: AddAttributesToRender 方法主要由控件开发人员使用要插入的其他属性和样式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>输出流<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: AddAttributesToRender 方法重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> state automatically posts back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>状态自动回发到服务器在单击时。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is posted back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定是否的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件回发到服务器在单击时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property to `true` causes a round trip to the server every time the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 将此属性设置为`true`导致到服务器的往返行程，每次单击控件时。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically post the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control to the server when it is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要自动发布的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件添加到服务器时单击; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否执行验证时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件被选定。

trans-unit.source: Use the CausesValidation property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用这属性来确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件被选定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules as specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定与所有页上的验证控件关联的输入的控件是否为指定的验证控件传递验证规则。

trans-unit.source: By default, clicking a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control does not cause page validation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，单击<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件不会导致页验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: To perform page validation when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is clicked, set the CausesValidation property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行页验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>单击控件，将这属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the CausesValidation property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control causes validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果这属性的值设置为`true`，你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件将导致验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果执行验证时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>单击; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>已选中控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is checked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>已选中控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to programmatically set the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以使用此属性以编程方式设置的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate a checked state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示选中的状态，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked*> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked*>发往服务器之间的属性更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedChanged event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引发的 CheckedChanged 事件时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>发往服务器之间的属性更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event does not post the page back to the server unless the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不将页面回发到服务器，除非<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件必须保持到此事件来正常工作的服务器的发送操作之间的一些值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Be sure that view state is enabled for this control.
trans-unit.target: 请确保对于此控件启用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the collection of attributes for the rendered input element of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的呈现输入元素的特性的集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is rendered and displayed using an HTML INPUT element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件呈现和显示使用 HTML 输入元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: You can add additional attributes to the rendered INPUT element using the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A> method on the InputAttributes property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其他属性添加到呈现的输入元素使用<xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A>InputAttributes 属性上的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of attribute names and values that are added to the rendered INPUT element for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 属性名称和值添加到的呈现输入元素的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the collection of attributes for the rendered LABEL element of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的属性集合的引用的呈现标签元素<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is rendered and displayed using an HTML LABEL element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件呈现并使用 HTML 标签元素中显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add additional attributes to the rendered LABEL element using the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A> method on the LabelAttributes property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其他属性添加到呈现标签元素使用<xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A>LabelAttributes 属性上的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of attribute names and values that are added to the rendered LABEL element for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 属性名称和值添加到的呈现标签元素的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理的回发数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: LoadPostData 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks if the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is different from its previous value, and if so, loads the content and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: LoadPostData 方法检查如果的回发数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件不同于以前的值，而如果是这样，加载内容，并返回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The index within the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: 引用要加载的内容已发布集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The collection posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发布到服务器的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已发布的内容不同于上次发布;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> object from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState 方法还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>对象从已保存的上一个页面请求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件保存的视图状态的值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to handle the event directly.
trans-unit.target: 这可以直接处理该事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>引发事件时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>发往服务器之间的属性更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件必须保持到此事件来正常工作的服务器的发送操作之间的一些值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Be sure that view state is enabled for this control.
trans-unit.target: 请确保对于此控件启用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)OnCheckedChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Registers client script for generating postback prior to rendering on the client if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册客户端脚本，用于生成之前如果客户端上呈现的回发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged*> method when the posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged*>方法时的已发布的数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控制已更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged%2A> method if the posted data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged%2A>方法如果的已发布的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控制已更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property is `true`, the controls that are set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> property are validated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性是`true`，在中设置的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>属性进行验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> on the client.
trans-unit.target: 显示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>客户端上。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>包含要在客户端上呈现的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将保存的更改<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>自页回发到服务器后查看状态。

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for the server control, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会自动放在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>服务器控件，它是<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>的实例的属性</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象的服务器控件的生命周期的保存状态阶段后。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element.
trans-unit.target: 保存视图状态，此字符串对象被作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the SaveViewState and modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for your server control.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写 SaveViewState 并修改提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>服务器控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> view state; otherwise, if no view state is associated with the object, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含的更改的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>视图状态; 否则为如果没有的视图状态是与该对象相关联<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 进程已发布数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> determines the posted <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>确定已发布<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The key value used to index an entry in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于在集合中的项进行索引的键值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains post information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>包含发布信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> has changed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>已更改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises when posted data for a control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 控件的已发布的数据发生更改时引发。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> fires an `CheckedChanged` event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>激发`CheckedChanged`事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text label associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与关联的文本标签<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the text label associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定与关联的文本标签<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to programmatically get the text label associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性还可以用于以编程方式获取与关联的文本标签<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text label associated with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_CheckBox" name="CheckBox" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的文本标签<xref uid="langword_csharp_CheckBox" name="CheckBox" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text label associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与关联的文本标签的对齐方式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the alignment of the text label associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的文本标签的对齐方式与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the text label appears to the right or left of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的文本标签是否显示向右或左侧的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property to specify the label text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>属性，以指定标签文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control so that they can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪视图状态更改为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控制，以便将它们存储在控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> property.
trans-unit.target: 此对象是可通过访问<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically calls the TrackViewState method when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is initialized.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 将自动调用 TrackViewState 方法时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件初始化。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件组的其中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ValidationGroup 属性来为其指定的验证组名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The ValidationGroup property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ValidationGroup 属性才起作用时，才的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the ValidationGroup property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当指定 ValidationGroup 属性的值，只有的验证控件才是指定组的一部分时验证<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件回发到服务器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the ValidationGroup and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定值的 ValidationGroup 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref> causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 为其控件组的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox"></xref>发回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。
